body:
I'll try.
Page 1: 
Toritsuka: Please let me rub your boobs! 
                  No, please don't make that kind of frankly disgusted face.
Saiki: We aren't dating, we aren't even lovers. In the first place, I'm a man!

Page 2: 
Toritsuka: I know that, but I can't possibly ask a girl, can I? After being called 'scum' so many times, even I have that much sense.
Saiki: Then how much sense does it make to ask a guy like me?
Toritsuka: You're not listening properly. i mean, it's just like groping a fat classmate. Think of it like that.
Saiki: Then go grope that fat classmate.
Toritsuka: Yuck! It has to be a girl!
This looks kinda good, still wishing for someone to translate it though
Can't even understand whats going on but the probable root cause of this is coffe jello
